Key Match Events: Matthew Wade hit three consecutive sixes off Shaheen Shah Afridi to end the match
Post-Match Reflections: Matthew Wade stated, 'Trying to keep calm is probably the biggest thing in the back end and I get to look down the other end and see his big rig looking to hit it out of the park.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan opener Mohammad Rizwan spent two nights in hospital with a chest infection, a development they had kept secret to protect team morale
Others: Australia beat Pakistan by five wickets to advance to the T20 World Cup final against New Zealand
